* Make it possible for bundles to carry documentation about intention, which
  feature/container/dependency/project it comes from. Emit this in the config
  files.

* Make it possible for system_settings and parameters to be documented in
  generated config files. Will need to define appropriate description methods
  that store it along side values

* Update felix container so it works in the correct format

* Add feature for EasyEJB

* Add feature for Hibernate 3.5.1
